Package com.example.happypuzzle

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccordionSelection
    Creates a high score list UI.
    BestPlayerList
    Single high score list, uses DatabaseTableContainer to store and fetch data.
    DatabaseTableContainer
    Simple container for a single table in SQLite for storing ResultTuples.
    DbItem
    Represents a single row in an SQLite table that contains high scores.
    HappypuzzleUI
    Main UI class
    Jigsaw
    Actual 4x4 jigsaw puzzle.
    PuzzleSelection
    For selecting a puzzle using OptionGroup.
    ResultTuple
    Represents a single score item, has name and score.
    SplitPanelLayout
    Main layout
    SQLitePool
    This code is a modification from http://dev.vaadin.com/ticket/10458
